Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: The process has several stages: 1. ReceiveApplication and DataCompletenessCheck with a loop for missing info. 2. SkillAssessment with a threshold. 3. CulturalFit and CommunityAffiliation Check where bias might be introduced. 4. ManagerialReview and FinalDecision.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: For the first model with unfairness, there should be an XOR branch at the CulturalFit stage. One branch is a standard CulturalFitCheck, and the other is a CommunityAffiliationCheck that gives an advantage. For the second model without unfairness, this XOR branch should be removed, and all applicants should go through the same CulturalFitCheck.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Let me outline the activities: ReceiveApplication, DataCompletenessCheck, RequestMoreInfo, SkillAssessment, CulturalFitCheck, CommunityAffiliationCheck, ManagerialReview, FinalDecision.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: For the data completeness loop, the loop is between DataCompletenessCheck and XOR Proceed tau or RequestMoreInfo. In POWL, this can be represented as a loop: DataCompletenessCheck, then choose either Proceed tau or RequestMoreInfo, if Proceed exit loop, if RequestMoreInfo back to DataCompletenessCheck.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The full model is a partial order where these components are ordered sequentially: loop for data completeness, then SkillAssessment, then XOR CulturalFitCheck and CommunityAffiliationCheck, then ManagerialReview to FinalDecision.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: For the second model without bias, same up to SkillAssessment, then only CulturalFitCheck no XOR, then ManagerialReview to FinalDecision.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Define all transitions, create loop1 as OperatorPOWL LOOP with children data_check and xor_loop XOR tau request_info, create xor_culture XOR culture_check comm_check, then StrictPartialOrder with nodes receive_app loop1 skill_assess xor_culture managerial_rev final_dec, add sequential order edges.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: For second model, similar definitions, loop2 same, nodes receive_app2 loop2 skill_assess2 culture_check2 managerial_rev2 final_dec2, add sequential order edges without XOR.
